name: PeopleSoft: All new message channel must be into a permission list
description: Objects (Message Channel) created by the project should be at least in one permission list (AuthChnlMon)
output: This report lists all the Message Chanels not in a permission list
rationale: To give access to the object, it must be referenced by a permission list
remediation: Check the design of the permission lists and add the object to the corresponding one
